events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit me properly and I no longer need it.
The customer has requested a refund due to sizing issues with the jacket they received.
Assigning the refund request to the customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging, as I just received it yesterday.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick assistance. I’ll ship the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
Refund process is set up and return label sent. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm we have received your return and the refund has been credited to your original payment method.
Your case regarding the jacket refund has been closed. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We appreciate your feedback.
